mapper.select: select o.*, lend_costume_image, lend_costume_name, photo_package_image, photo_package_title from orders o, lend_costume, photo_package where orders_package_code=photo_package_code and orders_costume_code=lend_costume_code and orders_id=#{orders_id}
select users_point from users where users_id=#{users_id}
mapper.insert: insert into package_orders(package_cart_ono, orders_package_quantity, orders_day, orders_paytype) values(#{package_cart_no}, #{orders_package_quantity}, now(), #{orders_paytype})
insert into costume_orders(costume_cart_ono, orders_costume_quantity, orders_day, orders_paytype) values(#{costume_cart_no}, #{orders_costume_quantity}, now(), #{orders_paytype})
